title: Hypnosis and Mind Control - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/25/19
itunes:title: Hypnosis and Mind Control - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/25/19
description:
Guest Host Richard Syrett and Hypnotism expert Jonathan Royle discuss the roll hypnosis has in helping change fears and addiction. They also touch on MK Ultra and mind control via the mass media.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
